channel.title: 718 Controller Issue
channel.description: Hello, I seem to have a problem. I am currently working on a skill project, (the construction skill), but whenever i get into the controller while the process is running, I'm unable to do ANYTHING but click buttons or objects, meaning I can't use items (like dropping them or wielding them), etc. Does anybody know how to resolve this?

item.title: 718 Controller Issue
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

check the actual file of controller, or paste your controllers code so i can help abit more?

Read full topic
